title: National Legal Aid
description: Aura provided support to a large and complex project to simplify legal information across all states and territories in Australia. We work with multiple stakeholders to provide a comprehensive information resource around family violence law in Australia.

details.p: Aura provided support to a large and complex project to simplify legal information across all states and territories in Australia. We work with multiple stakeholders to provide a comprehensive information resource around family violence law in Australia.
details.p2: Aura played a crucial role in a groundbreaking initiative aimed at streamlining legal information pertaining to family violence laws across various states and territories in Australia. This extensive project involved collaborating with multiple stakeholders to develop a comprehensive information resource dedicated to family violence legislation in the country.

client.title: Client Feedback
client.desc: “Great partnerships are built on great relationships and company name have worked to build those strong bonds at all levels with our team at Michael Hill. Taking the time to learn our business, and develop ways of working that are right for us, has been a key factor in delivering our project goals.”
